column4: How in the world does the netbook version need 384 mb of ram, and the regular version needs 256...?
It also uses more harddrive space than Xubuntu (1.8g/2.1g), I just installed them both in virtual machines to work out which to stick on my eee
I recommend Xubuntu for the netbook :)
Same. Thats what I used for my eee
